name: Latest News, Posts, Articles
author: Ferdaus Alom

sections.description:
Responsive Latest News/Posts/Feeds/Articles is easy to use. You can add as many News/Posts/Feeds/Articles as you want.
If you want to modify or want to add extra features, please contact the owner faferdaus@gmail.com.

Responsive Latest News/Posts/Feeds/Articles needs your support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Collect Lead Form and find it useful, please consider to donate to faferdaus@gmail.com. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Uses

Use this shortcode to show the News/Posts/Feeds/Articles [lnpa-latest-news]

Privacy notices

With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Latest-News-Posts folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find LNPA Settings menu in your WordPress admin screen.

[Support]
faferdaus@gmail.com
